metadata.Title: CVE-2019-8771 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: This issue was addressed with improved iframe sandbox enforcement. Thisissue is fixed in Safari 13.0.1, iOS 13. Maliciously crafted web contentmay violate iframe sandboxing policy.

criterions.comment: webkitgtk: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
webkit2gtk package in esm-infra/xenial is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in esm-infra/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
